BUREAU OF CIVIL AVIATION SECURITY 
(MINISTRY OF CIVIL AVIATION) 
GOVERNMENT OF INDIA 
A’ WING , JANPATH  BHAWAN , 
JANPATH, NEW DELHI -110001 
          Date: 28/07/2009 
 
AVSEC CIRCULAR NO. 12 / 2009 
 
Sub:   PERMISSION  FOR  ACCESS TO  THE  VEHICLE UP TO TARMAC IN RESPECT OF 
SHRI  BHAIRON SINGH SHEKHAWAT, FORMER VICE PRESIDENT 
 
With reference to BCAS Circular No.36/2005 dated 30.08.2005, Shri Bhairon Singh 
Shekhawat, Former Vice-President of India is permitted to avail the access of his vehicle up to the 
tarmac, on medical grounds, during his departure/ arrival by air at all airports in the country. 
This issues with the approval of Commissioner of Security (CA). 
 
 
(M.Malaviya) 
IPS 
Addl. Commissioner of Security (CA) 
 
Distribution: As per list attached. 
Copy to: 
1. MCA ( Shri S Gowri Shankar, Under Secretary ) :  w.r.t MCA letter No.AV.13024/39
